title: Is my normals MMR really that high that im being matched with plats constantly?
body: Hey so Im a player who is currently in bronze 2, finished silver 5 last year. in the recent weeks ive been matched in game with more gold/plat players then bronze/silver players. Is this a bug or is my mmr really that high?

replies.body: Borders on the loading screen represent the previous season and not the current.  Matchmaking groups players per their MMR and not their placement in ranked.  Some players might also be on a loss streak, meaning as your MMR continues to adjust so will the types of opponents you face.  Hope that helps!
